The Classify Objects Using Deep Learning tool uses a deep learning model to assign a class label or category to an object or feature.

The imagery or feature layer that will be used to classify objects.

The feature layer that identifies the location of each object that will be classified or labeled.

The count of features depends on additional factors such as filtering criteria and the analysis extent.

Specifies how raster items in an imagery layer will be processed after being mosaicked: together or individually.

The deep learning package that contains the model that will be used to classify the objects.

The model arguments and their default values that are in the deep learning model.

The name of the field that will contain the classification label in the output feature layer.

The name of the layer that will be created and added to the map.

The name of the folder in My content where the result will be saved.
